name: Hootsuite Dark Theme (New UI + New Streams)
description:
A darker theme for the revamped look and feel of the Hootsuite UI.
* Decreased energy consumption
* Not as bright / easier on eyes
* Dark and moody, just like me
additional_info: Just a quick override update to support new streams. Base theme done by stylesfordays https://userstyles.org/styles/106987/hootsuite-dark-theme-new-ui
